mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_student_grade WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND component_id = #{componentId}
SELECT sg.*, gc.class_id FROM t_student_grade sg INNER JOIN t_grade_component gc ON sg.component_id = gc.component_id WHERE gc.class_id = #{classId}

SELECT sg.*, gc.component_name, gc.weight, gc.max_score FROM t_student_grade sg INNER JOIN t_grade_component gc ON sg.component_id = gc.component_id WHERE sg.student_id = #{studentId} AND gc.class_id = #{classId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_student_grade (student_id, component_id, score, recorded_by) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{componentId}, #{score}, #{recordedBy}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE score = #{score}, recorded_by = #{recordedBy}, recorded_at = NOW()
